title: Subtraction Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula: $${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2-2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:  parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:    a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Identify $$b$$

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=\frac{1}{5} x$$ and $$b=\frac{1}{7} y$$ into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(\frac{1}{5} x-\frac{1}{7} y\right)}^2={\left(\frac{1}{5} x\right)}^2-2\frac{1}{5} x \frac{1}{7} y+{\left(\frac{1}{7} y\right)}^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 1 fifth x  and  b, is equal to 1 seventh y,  into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 1 fifth x minus 1 seventh y  squared is equal to parentheses 1 fifth x,  squared minus, 2 and 1 fifth, x 1 seventh y plus, parentheses 1 seventh y,  squared
math: $${\left(\frac{1}{5} x-\frac{1}{7} y\right)}^2={\left(\frac{1}{5} x\right)}^2-2\frac{1}{5} x \frac{1}{7} y+{\left(\frac{1}{7} y\right)}^2$$
